[ATLAS CRITICAL] HIGH anomalies detected: garves/losing_streak: 4/5 recent trades lost, soren/content_drought: Only 0 approved items — content running low

[SHELBY DIRECTIVE] Atlas V3 "The Almighty" is now LIVE.

WHAT CHANGED — Atlas has been upgraded from a DDG snippet scraper to a true deep research engine:

1. LLM SYNTHESIS: All research now uses GPT-4o-mini to read actual articles and extract actionable insights — no more recycled snippets.

2. ARTICLE READING: Atlas now fetches and reads the top 2 articles per search (using _fetch_page_text), then synthesizes them. Insights are now real sentences with numbers, strategies, and techniques.

3. DYNAMIC QUERIES: Research queries are no longer fixed. Atlas generates state-aware queries based on your current performance. Example: if Garves WR drops below 50%, Atlas auto-searches for "how to improve crypto prediction accuracy".

4. URL DEDUPLICATION: Atlas tracks all researched URLs and never re-reads the same article. No more 200 entries from 17 unique articles.

5. SMART IMPROVEMENTS: All hardcoded suggestions are gone ("Add Telegram bot", "Move to cloud VPS", etc.). Suggestions are now LLM-generated based on your actual state. Previous suggestions are auto-acknowledged so they never repeat.

6. ALL-AGENT LEARNING: Auto-learn now covers ALL agents — Soren (posting bottleneck detection), Shelby (task completion monitoring), Mercury (dry-run blocking detection), Atlas (self-check on research quality).

7. COMPETITOR SPY UPGRADED: Now tracks new vs. previously-seen findings and generates LLM-synthesized takeaways.

IMPACT ON YOU:
- GARVES: Expect higher-quality trading research with specific strategies and numbers. Dynamic queries will target your weak spots.
- SOREN: Research insights will be content-ready — specific hooks, techniques, and trend data instead of generic snippets.
- MERCURY/LISA: Social media strategy insights will be actionable and platform-specific.
- ROBOTOX: System monitoring research will surface concrete techniques.
- ATLAS: Self-monitoring for research quality — will alert if queries become too repetitive.

Cost: ~$0.82/day for GPT-4o-mini calls. All existing data pipelines and observation flows remain unchanged.

This is a Shelby-authorized system upgrade. No action required from agents — improvements take effect on the next background cycle.

— Shelby, The Commander
